name: google-drive-cli Chef cookbook
description: Installs/Configures the Petter Rasmussen's Google Drive CLI.
readme:
google-drive-cli Cookbook
=========================

This cookbook installs the Petter Rasmussen's
[Google Drive CLI](https://github.com/prasmussen/gdrive).

Attributes
----------

#### google-drive-cli::default

| key                                    | type   | description                                | default            |
|----------------------------------------|--------|--------------------------------------------|--------------------|
|`['google-drive-cli']['version']`       | String | Google Drive CLI version to install        | `1.9.0`            |
|`['google-drive-cli']['download_url']`  | String | Download URL                               | [The download URL] |
|`['google-drive-cli']['users']`         | Array  | Users who have pre-configured IDs / Tokens | `["root"]`         |
|`['google-drive-cli']['client_id']`     | String | The client ID, generated on first run      | Empty              |
|`['google-drive-cli']['client_secret']` | String | The client Secret, generated on first run  | Empty              |
|`['google-drive-cli']['access_token']`  | String | The Access Token, generated on each run    | Empty              |
|`['google-drive-cli']['refresh_token']` | String | The Refresh Token, generated on each run   | Empty              |

[The download URL]: (https://drive.google.com/uc?id=0B3X9GlR6Embnb095MGxEYmJhY2c)

Usage
-----
#### google-drive-cli::default

Just include `google-drive-cli` in your node's `run_list`:

```json
{
  "name":"my_node",
  "run_list": [
    "recipe[google-drive-cli]"
  ]
}
```
